comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model AirportElevation adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/AirportElevation/schema.json
description: Property. The height of an Airport, above sea level.

contents.name: Name
contents.comment: The name of an Airport elevation above sea level.

contents.name: Value
contents.comment: The value of an Airport elevation above sea level.

contents.name: AirportElevationUnitOfMeasurement
contents.comment: The unit of measure of the height of an Airport above sea level (FT for foot or M for metre).
